bike.description: 6061 T6 aluminum main/carbon seatstays & chainstays, E2 integrated headtube, BB86 integrated bottom bracket

components.description: Bontrager carbon  FCC, carbon E2 1-1/8" - 1-1/2" steerer, wide stance carbon legs,  accepts 25mm hub endcaps w/integrated SpeedTrap  computer mount
Bontrager Race FCC, wide-bracing large flange hubs, w/25mm endcap interface
Bontrager Race Lite 700x23, folding aramid bead
Bontrager R2 WSD, hollow cromoly rails, 150mm width
Cane Creek IS 2 for E2 Integrated
